item.title: Lessons learnt after two years usage of cert-manager
item.description: Yesterday I spent one or two hours to resolve a pending order issue. I encountered the issue before when I configured cert-manager with ACME. However after a short while detour to flutter(ios,android) development, I couldnâ€™t quickly locate the root causes. This made me think that it is better off to note down the lessons I leant here. DNS01 vs HTTP01 HTTP01 is quite easy to setup for one domain name.
